pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, April 11, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, April 11, 2016:

Ottawa

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Vaisakhi Celebration on the Hill.

Room 237-C
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media should arrive for 10:30 a.m


1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Dr. Jane Goodall.

Office of the Prime Minister
Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should gather in the House of Commons Foyer for 12:45 p.m.


7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Vaisakhi Celebration on the Hill reception and will deliver remarks.

Sir John A. MacDonald Building
144 Wellington Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Open coverage for remarks


PMO Media Relations: 
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
